Products.annotation: Panthenol is the alcohol analog of pantothenic acid, and is thus a provitamin of Bâ‚…. In organisms, it is quickly oxidized to pantothenic acid. It is a viscous transparent liquid at room temperature. Panthenol is used in pharmaceutical and cosmetic products as a moisturizer and to improve wound healing.
